comment_body: In all honesty, this story is meant to be what I am currently going through, as writing helps me get the feelings out, and stay sane so I can deliver the testimonies of psychological and mental abuse from my mother and stepfather. I honestly hope this ends the way i want it to. Sorry if it's too depressing, I'll take it down if need be. This is my first story as well, so please feel free to critique it. I need something to keep me busy anyways.

Good luck with your bad situation.  This is a great story...I can feel your pain. 

You will get through this time.
Sorry about what you are going through,  hope it ends well.

Very well written. As someone who can relate to the abuse from the people who should have protected us, i understand what your going through.  It isn't a easy road to walk but at the end of it we come out as stronger people better than those who abused us and took from us the innocence that should have been ours a lot longer. My road has led me to become a better mother than mine ever was and I found peace in my children.  I hope you find your peace in life. That you find light in all the darkness the world holds. I hope you find joy, laughter, and love, and that you are able to trust again.

No need to take it down
Well written and obviously needed 
Keep writing and rely on your strength to get through the coming days!
Thanks for the good luck, I honestly feel like I'm going to need it by the end of this whole court process. Thanks again.
Thank you so much. This really does mean more than you think. Support like this is what keeps me going. Thank you
Thank you, the positive support really does mean a lot to me
